column1: '''Helen Armstrong''' is an author and member of [[The Tolkien Society]]. She designed the logo of the Tolkien Society, and is a frequent contributor to ''[[Mallorn (journal)
column2: Mallorn]]''. She wrote two entries in the ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien Encyclopedia: Scholarship and Critical Assessment
column3: J.R.R. Tolkien Encyclopedia]]'' ([[Arwen]] and [[Aragorn]]), and compiled ''[[The History of Middle-earth Index]]''.
